item.description:
Come join us on the third Wednesday of the month at 7:00 PM at Jacob Wirth for some good food and light hearted Stammtisch talk. There is always something to talk about being German/Swiss/Austrian in Boston.

We expressively welcome anybody who lived for a while in a German speaking country.

See you on Wednesday!

Please do not forget to RSVP

Kaj
Your humble organizer
P.S.: Jacob Wirth is a German Restaurant in the theater district of Boston, that serves German favorites such as Bratwurst and Sauerkraut or Wiener Schnitzel. They also have Paulaner Hefeweizen and other German beer.
P.P.S.: There is parking right next to the restaurant, which is $15 deposit, which is refunded if you return in less than 2 hours with a stamp from Jacob Wirth.
item.name: German Expatriates in Boston Meetup March Meetup
